doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
creation: late 18th century; alteration: 27 Apr 1830; alteration: circa 1830
Indian burial grounds examined by Thomas Jefferson on this site--J H Clark Home 1906

1 Story Brick, 44'x35,' Pie-shaped Brick Columns, Molded Brick Cornice, 5 Bay, 2 Pile, Belvedere, Piano Nobile, Hipped Roof, Flemish Bond, 5 Course American Bond, 5 Course American with Flemish Bond, Penciling, Kings Closers, Queens Closers, Rectangular Banisters, 9/3, 9/9, Rose Head Nails, Cut Nails with Stamped Heads, 2 Leaf Door, 6 Panel Doors, Transom, Center Passage not through House, Clay Insulation in 1st & 2nd Floors, Winter Kitchen, Cemetery
Eastham in Forks of Rivanna River
